data.Name: Carolyn Hall
data.staff_bio:
Carolyn Hall is a Technical Assistance Specialist at ICI and is working on the Ticket Success Project providing national technical assistance to public workforce systems.  Ms. Hallâ€™s previous project at ICI was with the Vocational Specialist Initiative as the Vocational Specialist Supervisor.  Ms. Hall trained and supervised vocational specialist staff placed throughout fourteen TANF sites in the state of Massachusetts.

Carolyn Hall has seventeen years experience in the field of Human Services both in direct service and management primarily working in vocational rehabilitation and mental health.  Past positions include Vocational Specialist Supervisor, Supported Living Team Leader, Mental Health Counselor, and Club House Employment Coordinator.
data.staff_ed:
B.A., Lesley College
M.A. Clinical Social Work, Boston University
